physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Marked peripheral edema; proteinuria 24 g/d; albumin 23 g/L; serum creatinine 1.1 mg/dl. Hypothyroid status with initiation of thyroxine therapy.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially treated with 60 mg/d prednisolone leading to remission. Suffered relapses and required dosage adjustments including switch to cyclosporine, remained in remission with trace proteinuria for 3.5 years until cyclosporine cessation, followed by another relapse managed by prednisolone and reintroduction of cyclosporine.
